variation.name: Include_IncludedStylesheetShouldHaveDifferentBaseUri
variation.description: Use xsl:include to include a stylesheet. The base uri of the stylesheet should be different than the parent that included it. [Bug 65666]

variation.name: Include_IncludeStylesheetWithoutXslNamespace
variation.description: Use the xsl:include tag to include another stylesheet which declares the xsl namespace, but doesn't use it. The text should be directly treated as an output element. Additionally, the xsl namespace declaration in the second stylesheet should not show up in the retult. This is a regression test for [Bug 49668].

variation.name: Include_ParentExplicitlyExcludesChildNamespace
variation.description: Use xsl:include to include another doc, excluding a prefix in the parent document but having the same one defined in the child document (explicitly). [Bug 65665]

variation.name: Include_ParentImplicitlyExcludesChildNamespace
variation.description: Use xsl:include to include another doc, excluding a prefix in the parent document but having the same one defined in the child document. [Bug 65665]

variation.name: Include_ParentNSVisibleToIncludedDoc
variation.description: Use xsl:include to include another document that uses a namespace declared in the parent document. [Bug 65665]
